text: Hans Erik Dyvik Husby (15 June 1972 – 19 November 2021), also known as Hank von Helvete and Hank von Hell, was a Norwegian musician and actor. He was known for being the lead vocalist of the punk rock band Turbonegro.Turbo charged Sydney Morning Herald – 3 October 2003Turbonegro Bring Boners Back to Times Square – Vulture. Nymag.com (26 September 2007). Retrieved on 2011-06-29. An actor, he was known for playing Cornelis Vreeswijk in the biographical movie Cornelis. Von Hell died on 19 November 2021, aged 49. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Norwegian singers Category:Norwegian writers Category:Norwegian movie actors Category:Norwegian guitarists Category:Punk musicians Category:Heavy metal musicians Category:Heavy metal singers
title: Hank von Hell
